name.en: Integrated design and implementation of deep learning and building information modeling
name.ch: 深度學習與建築資訊模型程式整合設計

goal.en: This course focuses on BIM parametric design, plug-in programming and deep learning methods, so that students can integrate and design applications for near-zero buildings or disaster prevention and mitigation, and will be familiar with how artificial intelligence can be combined with BIM to produce practical applications. When a building has a complete BIM model, it is also said to have a large amount of geometry, material and other data, which is suitable for the application of deep learning methods for integration and analysis. This course has three main goals: the first is to teach BIM parametric design and plug-in programming as well as deep learning methods, the second is to design and integrate these techniques, and the third is to appropriately apply them to the field of near-zero buildings and disaster prevention and mitigation.
goal.ch: This course focuses on BIM parametric design, plug-in programming and deep learning methods, so that students can integrate and design applications for near-zero buildings or disaster prevention and mitigation, and will be familiar with how artificial intelligence can be combined with BIM to produce practical applications. When a building has a complete BIM model, it is also said to have a large amount of geometry, material and other data, which is suitable for the application of deep learning methods for integration and analysis. This course has three main goals: the first is to teach BIM parametric design and plug-in programming as well as deep learning methods, the second is to design and integrate these techniques, and the third is to appropriately apply them to the field of near-zero buildings and disaster prevention and mitigation.

content.en:
Key topics include:
 BIM parametric design
 BIM plugin programming
 Deep learning methods
 Integrated design and approach for the building industry
 Nearly net-zero buildings and disaster mitigation applications
content.ch:

textbook.en: [1] Rafael Sacks, Chuck Eastman, Ghang Lee, Paul Teicholz. (2018) BIM Handbook: A Guide to Building Information Modeling for Owners, Designers, Engineers, Contractors, and Facility Managers, 3rd Edition, Wiley. [2] Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, Aaron Courville (2016) Deep Learning (Adaptive Computation and Machine Learning series), The MIT Press. [3] Selected case reports.
textbook.ch: [1] Rafael Sacks, Chuck Eastman, Ghang Lee, Paul Teicholz. (2018) BIM Handbook: A Guide to Building Information Modeling for Owners, Designers, Engineers, Contractors, and Facility Managers, 3rd Edition, Wiley. [2] Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, Aaron Courville (2016) Deep Learning (Adaptive Computation and Machine Learning series), The MIT Press. [3] Selected case reports.
